text:
Oh,
you're so full of motivation, Hana...!

Yeah, because isn't it fun to stay overnight
and have lessons together with everyone?
It kinda feels like a school trip, doesn't it?

After the lessons,
we can all take a bath together, have dinner...

We can play card games in our rooms,
eat snacks, and have secret talks──

Oh, and maybe
we can have a campfire too?

H-haha...
I wonder about that... I'll ask the staff at the facility.

──But, Hana,
while I'm glad you're having fun,

the purpose of this camp is the lessons, remember...!
Please don't forget that.

I really want to grow
during this camp,

So Producer, please don't go easy on me
and give me serious lessons, okay?

Yeah, leave it to me.
...Hana, let's make this a great camp together, okay?
